title: Among the Automated - Self titled album [2016]
description:
Among the Automated's debut, self titled album! Download, listen loud and enjoy!


"Among the Automated" is a one man band from Ontario, Canada. Combining a unique blend of metal, electronic, hardcore, punk and yes even banjo (check out Scared Crow), Among the Automated delivers something that we didn't even know we were looking for. Thy ears shall be pleased.

All music written, recorded, produced, mastered, etc...by Mike Rideout of "Rideout Recordings".


Support independent musicians! Album is available on iTunes, Spotify, Google Play, Amazon and several other digital music distribution sites.

iTunes: 
https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/among-the-automated/id1147463748?ign-mpt=uo%3D4


Spotify: 
https://play.spotify.com/album/4SGsOmFWLMN6IlQF5v89ls


Google Play: 
https://play.google.com/store/music/album/Among_the_Automated_Among_the_Automated?id=Bf6k3jpmaryfmmmunon45oa3aqq


m/


Track list:

01. Admittance
02. Evil Disco
03. The Room
04. Erratic (the automation)
05. Scared Crow. Scarecrow.
06. Binary Bloodline
07. Intro_Z
08. H.W.A.S.A.Z. (he wrote a song about zombies)
09. Totality (the automation)
10. Design
11. Hurt (nine inch nails cover)[Bonus track]
12. The Last Song He Never Wrote
